title: project skin cache
body:
I have been buying those cache in a really bad mood  , because i think i have been ripped off ,and tricked to buy more and what so ever , i just continue getting the same skin which i already have . 
Don't you riot suppose rule those skin we already have out of the cache , so that we actually paying to get something , not just keep getting what we have , and then what spend money and let those Had skin rot in the inventory ? 
come on , who is gonna buy any of those things if system works like that . 
personally , i would love to spend money to have a fun game and pleasure with it , but wasting money on lucky lottery which now i know its just money sucking tricks , oh , hell , i wont spend a dime on it anymore .

replies.body:
Looking into this for you, I see you've been successfully re-rolling shards into new skins or using orange essences to craft ones you want.  I don't see anything here that would suggest duplicates, but the nature of obtaining shards is pretty random.  While you might have shards of content already owned, the rerolls yield permanent skins for ones you don't.  

More information on how crafting works can be found in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide to help players better prepare for how they prefer to use the system.  Hextech crafting is optional, if you don't want to use that's totally fine too.  I hope that helps clear things up!
